bill_title: to provide for the promulgation of rules governing inspections of and the enforcement of regulations related to certain concentrated animal feeding operations.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for the promulgation of rules governing inspections of certain swine facilities. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Department of Environment and Natural Resources shall promulgate rules pursuant to chapter 1-26 to establish an inspection program or system for any swine operation that is operating or proposes to operate under a general permit issued by any agency of the State of South Dakota. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for the promulgation of rules governing inspections of certain concentrated animal feeding operations. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Department of Environment and Natural Resources shall promulgate rules pursuant to chapter 1-26 to establish an inspection program or system for any concentrated animal feeding operation that is required to operate under a general or individual water pollution control permit issued under chapter 34A-2 or required to obtain approval of plans and specifications pursuant to § 34A-2-27. BILL HISTORY 2/3/97 First read in House and referred to Agriculture & Natural Resources. H.J. 267 2/11/97 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/13/97 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/13/97 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/13/97 Agriculture & Natural Resources Do Pass, Passed, AYES 12, NAYS 1. H.J. 461 2/14/97 Deferred to another day. H.J. 500 2/20/97 Motion to Amend, Passed. H.J. 607 2/20/97 House of Representatives Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 61, NAYS 6. H.J. 607 2/20/97 House of Representatives Title Amended. H.J. 608

bill_versions.bill_version: Senate Agriculture and Natural Resources Engrossed
bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for the promulgation of rules governing inspections of and the enforcement of regulations related to certain concentrated animal feeding operations. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Department of Environment and Natural Resources shall promulgate rules pursuant to chapter 1-26 to establish an inspection and enforcement program or system for any concentrated animal feeding operation that is required to operate under a general or individual water pollution control permit issued under chapter 34A-2 or required to obtain approval of plans and specifications pursuant to § 34A-2-27. BILL HISTORY 2/3/97 First read in House and referred to Agriculture & Natural Resources. H.J. 267 2/11/97 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/13/97 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/13/97 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/13/97 Agriculture & Natural Resources Do Pass, Passed, AYES 12, NAYS 1. S.J. 584 2/25/97 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/25/97 Agriculture & Natural Resources Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 8, NAYS 0.
